command.description: Open the Objects view if not already visible
command.name: Open Objects

category.description: Commands related to SVEditor document generation
category.name: Documents

command.name: Go to Matching Bracket
command.description: Moves the cursor to the matching bracket

command.name: Select Enclosing Element
command.description: Expand selection to include enclosing element

command.name: Go to Next Member
command.description: Move the caret to the next member of the translation unit

command.name: Go to Previous Member
command.description: Move the caret to the previous member of the translation unit

command.name: Add Natural Docs Comment
command.description: Add a Natural Docs comment stub to the member element

wizard.name: SystemVerilog Filelist
wizard.description: Creates a new SystemVerilog filelist (argument file). Provides the option to initialize this file from files discovered in user-specified directories

transfer.name: SVEditor Edit Settings
transfer.description: SVEditor editing settings, including colors, auto-indent, and content assist

transfer.name: SVEditor Template Settings
transfer.description: SVEditor template settings, including template repository paths and template variables

wizard.name: Compilation Arguments
wizard.description: Creates a filelist (argument file) by running a compilation command and capturing the paths and arguments specified to vendor tools such as vlog, ncvlog, and vcs

template.name: always_ff
template.pattern: always_ff @(posedge ${clk} or negedge ${reset_n}) begin if (!${reset_n}) begin ${flop} <= 1'b0; end else begin ${flop} <= ${cursor}; end end

template.name: always_latch
template.pattern: always_latch begin if (!${reset_n}) begin ${latch} <= 1'b0; end else if (${clock}) begin ${latch} <= ${cursor}; end end

template.name: case
template.pattern: case (${signal}) ${first}: begin ${cursor} end default: begin end endcase

template.name: casex
template.pattern: casex (${signal}) ${first}: begin ${cursor} end default: begin end endcase

template.name: casez
template.pattern: casez (${signal}) ${first}: begin ${cursor} end default: begin end endcase
